A special form of \textit{Latin square design} is called \textit{Williams square design} (WSD) in which every treatment follows every other treatment only once. For normal response when $t = p$ and $t$ is even, for reduced models LSD and  for full models WSD are  variance balanced designs (\cite{John2014}, page 361).
